headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.google.com *.googletagmanager.com *.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.google.com *.googletagmanager.com; img-src 'self' data: https: *.google.com *.googletagmanager.com *.gravatar.com; font-src 'self' *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' *.google-analytics.com *.google.com *.googletagmanager.com https://formspree.io; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self' https://formspree.io;
